nodes.text: The Tenara system was a star system that was located within the Gordian Reach sector, a part of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories and Trans-Hydian regions. A small hyperlane connected the system to the planet Korphir. The Tenara system contained the planet Tenara, on which, centuries before 43 ABY, pirates from Korphir used hidden vaults to store their stolen loot.
The Tenara system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it in grid square Q-6.
